entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C

Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
